sentences.en: An obligate anaerobe can survive only in the absence of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 专性厌氧生物只能在无氧条件下生存.

sentences.en: Detection methods of anaerobe in beer were introduced, such as, PlateAgar and several rapid detect methods.
sentences.cn: 该文介绍了啤酒厌氧菌的多种检验方法, 如平皿培养法、开放保存法及几种微生物的快速检验法.

sentences.en: Fostering of aerobe and anaerobe before and after root canal sterilization with microwave.
sentences.cn: 心脏手术后病人血及其引流血经需氧菌及厌氧菌培养均阴性.

sentences.en: It is stronger than the ciprofloxacin for anaerobe.
sentences.cn: 对部分厌氧菌也有较强的抗菌活性.

sentences.en: Methane would be generated from heavy oil anaerobic biodegradation, the process of biodegradation run through multi-tache, which was regarded as sort of water-hydrocarbon reactions involving anaerobe.
sentences.cn: 稠油在厌氧细菌作用下隆解成气的过程是通过多个环节完成的，是微生物参与的水-烃反应。

sentences.en: The anaerobe resistance fungus medicine has the stable sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 厌氧菌对抗菌药物有较稳定的敏感性。

sentences.en: The purificial to anaerobe. The purification rate could amount to more than 93 % by anaerobic method.
sentences.cn: 用厌氧生物净化法净化此工艺废水,可使净化效率达到93%以上.

words.tran_cn: [微] 厌氧的，[微] 厌气的；没有气而能生活的

trans.tran_en: an organism that does not require oxygen for respiration
